main event: A resident observed a brilliant blue-white light falling downward, which appeared to land near Tanana AFB, Alaska.
interesting points: The sighting was evaluated by the reporting officer as a meteor., The event occurred on 4 Dec 1952., Numerous residents, including both natives and white residents, reported seeing brilliant lights moving at high speeds., The light was reported to be moving west to southeast., The object was sighted by a native dog team driver traveling one mile west.
